# Family Feud Web App — Project Overview

## Vision
An interactive, fully customizable Family Feud–style web app with:
- Classic answer board and reveal animations
- Team scoring and strike tracking
- Host control panel and player-facing board
- Fast Money round
- Editable question bank
- Sound effects, timers, and round multipliers

## Game Flow (High Level)
1. Setup teams and questions in the host control panel.
2. Each round starts with a Face-Off.
3. Winning team chooses pass or play.
4. Team plays the board with up to 3 strikes.
5. Opposing team can steal if 3 strikes occur.
6. After 3–4 rounds, highest-scoring team plays Fast Money.
7. Two players answer 5 questions to reach 200 points.

## Core Screens
- Host Control Panel
- Player Board (Main Game)
- Face-Off View
- Fast Money View
- Question Bank / Editor

## Non-Goals (for now)
- Online multiplayer
- User accounts / authentication
- Server-side persistence (initially)
